commands.name: az network dns dnssec-config create
commands.summary: Create the DNSSEC configuration on a DNS zone.
commands.syntax:
az network dns dnssec-config create --resource-group
                                    --zone-name
                                    [--if-match]
                                    [--if-none-match]
                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network dns dnssec-config create -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network dns dnssec-config delete
commands.summary: Delete the DNSSEC configuration on a DNS zone. This operation cannot be undone.
commands.syntax:
az network dns dnssec-config delete [--ids]
                                    [--if-match]
                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--subscription]
                                    [--yes]
                                    [--zone-name]
examples: az network dns dnssec-config delete -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network dns dnssec-config show
examples: az network dns dnssec-config show -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network dns dnssec-config wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
